1.1.0.en: Optionally hide voltage. Avoid quick toggling charging sessions. Replace energy meter with last charging session. Add energy meter for energy consumption this year. Add condition cards. Add tokens to flow cards.

1.1.1.en: Restored start and stop charging cards.

1.1.2.en: Fixed polling bugs and added a debug log to the settings view!

1.1.3.en: Added kwh for current session. Translated charge mode token to a string. Fixed charge mode never getting to finished.

1.1.4.en: Fixed bad enum value for charge mode capability.

1.1.5.en: Improved token renewal and fault handling.

1.2.0.en: Adjusted set available current action card to take current per phase.

1.2.1.en: Added fix for car_connected token and debug line to improve it.

1.2.2.en: Improved debug logging for failed state handling.

1.3.0.en: Car (dis)connected triggers now rely on ChargingOperationMode to trigger.

1.3.1.en: Fix missing car connected capability causing charge mode updates to fail.

1.3.2.en: Charging  button is now only charging when the car is actively charging.

1.3.3.en: Fix for the condition flow cards.

1.3.4.en: Fix zero circuit current falsely showing as maximum available current.

1.3.5.en: Fix a bug with Homey 2023 on v10.0.0

1.4.0.en: Initial support for the Zaptec Pro charger

1.4.1.en: PoC driver for the Home device.

1.4.2.en: Bugfix for Home and Pro charger flow cards. Temperature and humidity capabilities added.

1.4.3.en: Philip fixed a bug with last sessions energy.
